from overrides import overrides

from rqa.model.base import ModelBase



[docs]class RetrievalModelBase(ModelBase):
    """
    Document Retrieval Model (trainable + End2End)
    Model Base

    # TODO: need to define detail spec

    * Args:
        token_embedder: 'TokenEmbedder', Used to embed the inputs.

    """

    def __init__(self, token_embedder):
        super(RetrievalModelBase, self).__init__(token_embedder)


[docs]    @overrides
    def forward(self, batch):
        """ batch (features and labels) -> logits -> loss """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def make_metrics(self, predictions):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def make_predictions(self, output_dict):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def predict(self, output_dict, raw_feature, token_data):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def print_examples(self, index, inputs, predictions):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError




[docs]class RetrievalIndependentModelBase(ModelBase):
    """
    Document Retrieval Model (Independent)
    Model Base

    * Args:
        docs: documents consisting of title and content

    """

    def __init__(self, docs):
        super(RetrievalIndependentModelBase, self).__init__(None)

        self.docs = [doc.content for doc in docs]
        self.titles = [doc.title for doc in docs]

    @overrides
    def __call__(self, query):
        """ docs - query -> retrieval """
        return NotImplementedError


[docs]    @overrides
    def make_metrics(self, predictions):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def make_predictions(self, output_dict):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def predict(self, output_dict, raw_feature, token_data):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError



[docs]    @overrides
    def print_examples(self, index, inputs, predictions):
        """ need to implement """
        return NotImplementedError
